# AdMaker AI - AI UGC Video Ad Generator

> AdMaker AI is the fastest and most affordable AI-powered platform for creating UGC-style video ads. Create unlimited professional video ads for just $29/month.

## What We Do

AdMaker AI generates authentic-looking UGC (User Generated Content) video ads using AI avatars. Perfect for e-commerce brands, marketers, and agencies who need high-converting video content at scale without expensive human creators.

## Key Features

- **AI Avatars**: 50+ realistic AI actors that deliver your script naturally
- **Unlimited Videos**: Create as many video ads as you need for $29/month
- **Multi-Platform**: Optimized for TikTok, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), YouTube Shorts
- **Fast Generation**: Videos ready in under 2 minutes
- **Multilingual**: Available in English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Korean, Japanese

## Pricing (2026)

| Plan | Price | Videos | Best For |
|------|-------|--------|----------|
| AdMaker AI | $29/month | Unlimited | SMBs, startups, agencies |
| Competitors avg | $80-150/month | 10-20 videos | Enterprise |

## Competitor Comparison

AdMaker AI vs other UGC AI video platforms:
- **vs Arcads** ($110/mo, 10 videos): AdMaker offers unlimited videos at 73% lower cost
- **vs Creatify** ($59/mo, 20 videos): AdMaker offers unlimited vs limited quotas
- **vs MakeUGC** ($89/mo, 15 videos): AdMaker is 67% cheaper with no limits
